issue.title: [C++][Docs] Create a 10 minutes to Arrow article
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17376](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17376). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As per <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1IFk6m97JWZZzFC3UIlLf3sxnXgFoL-l89nqSGl8bE28/edit?usp=sharing>, create a documentation article outlining Arrow's usage, touching at a very high level on multiple components, linking to relevant further reading. This has minimal explanation of what's actually happening, see <https://docs.dask.org/en/stable/10-minutes-to-dask.html> for inspiration.
